archimate:DataObject.name: Visual Studio Code
archimate:DataObject.documentation: Visual Studio Code (VS Code) is a free, open-source code editor developed by Microsoft. It's lightweight, fast, and highly customizable through a vast array of extensions available in its marketplace. VS Code supports a wide variety of programming languages and frameworks right out of the box. It has integrated Git control, debugging, and a robust set of built-in tools for code navigation and refactoring. Its IntelliSense code completion feature aids faster coding, while the built-in terminal and support for multiple terminals enhance workflow efficiency. The editorâ€™s settings and extensions are syncable across machines, making it easy to maintain a consistent development environment.
